title: Motion 5.2.2
description:
Name: Motion
Version: 5.2.2
Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: Pre-K'ed
OS version: OS X 10.10.4 or later
Processor type(s) & speed: 64-bit processor
Courtesy of TNT Team
Release Date: September 3, 2015
What's New in Version 5.2.2
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixes render errors that may occur when using reflective materials with 3D text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improves stability when swapping materials on 3D text with published parameters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improves performance when loading text styles
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Motion Title templates with published text layout parameters now export correctly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixes an issue that may cause 3D text to appear dark when rendered
Introduced in Version 5.2
Introducing 3D titles
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Beautifully animated and easily customizable 3D text
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple templates to get started quickly
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cinematic templates with built-in backgrounds and animations
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Save any 3D title and access it instantly in Final Cut Pro X
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Large collection of text styles to create stunning looks in one click
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Customize your titles with hundreds of combinations of materials, lighting, and edges
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional controls let you adjust environments, shadows, and more
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instantly convert any 2D title to 3D
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create advanced 3D looks with multiple materials and edges on each character
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flexible surface-shading with options for texture maps, diffuse and specular reflection, and bump mapping
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Cast shadows from 3D text onto itself and other objects in a 3D scene
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add multiple lights, cameras, and tracking to any 3D title
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In-camera glint effects
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Support for sequencing 3D text animations
Additional features
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 12 new generators including Manga Lines, Sunburst, and Spiral Graphics
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved keyframing including copy and paste in the Timeline
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved mask and shape creation for rectangles and circles plus conversion to bezier shape for more control
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Easily monitor background Share operations from within Motion
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Improved performance on Intel-based GPUs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Better performance of FxPlug plug-ins and built-in effects that use multiple frames like Echo and Trails
Camera formats
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Panasonic AVC-Ultra codec family
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sony XAVC-S
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ JVC H.264 Long GOP
More Info: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/motion/id434290957?mt=12
Designed for video editors, Motion 5 lets you customise Final Cut Pro titles, transitions, and effects.
Or create your own dazzling animations in 2D or 3D space, with real-time feedback as you work
